items.sentence: Tom probably won't be able to do everything by himself.
Tom is married, has three children and lives in Boston.
Tom is actually one of the best guitar players in town.
Tom is a good teacher and all of his students love him.
Tom has spent a lot of money trying to make Mary happy.
If somebody had broken in, the alarm would've gone off.
If someone had broken in, the alarm should've gone off.
Mary told me that she wanted Tom to buy her a necklace.
Please tell me how to fill out the disembarkation card.
This airport has up to 300 takeoffs and landings a day.
Tom isn't the only one in our office who speaks French.
I don't think that Tom knows who gave me this umbrella.
I could've helped if you'd let me know you needed help.
I still haven't figured out what's causing the problem.
Tom just stood there, wondering what might happen next.
Tom waited patiently for three hours, and then gave up.
Grandpa fell down the stairs and was seriously injured.
The bus came to a stop, and all the passengers got off.
Tom told me that he thought it would be fun to do that.
Tom told me that he thought he had a chance of winning.
